title: Seeing the deceased in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: This vision has many different meanings and connotations that depend on knowing the details of the dream and the condition of the deceased and the dreamer from a psychological and social point of view. Therefore, in this article from your website gptafser.com/, we will talk about most of the interpretations, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing the deceased in a dream for a single girl. The appearance of the deceased in an unmarried girl’s dream has different interpretations according to the details of the vision. Seeing an unmarried girl suffering from intense sadness over a dead person smiling at her In a dream. Good skin at the end of sadness, good condition and comfort. It also expresses joy in what has been achieved after giving up on attaining it, and God knows best. It is a sign of relief from distress and joy after sadness. Seeing the dead laughing loudly in a girl’s dream. It is a sign of his presence in a prominent position. It is great in the sight of God Almighty. It is also a good sign of the dreamer’s success in her life and work and her success in studying, and God knows best. As for seeing the dead person silent and looking at an unmarried girl in the dream, it is an indication of his need to pray for him and pay zakat in his name, and God knows best. It is also a sign of despair that The viewer feels it due to the pressures of life. When an unmarried girl sees the dead man, he looks at her with a look befitting a dream. This dream indicates a decline in insight and a lack of effort to achieve his goals in life, and God knows best. As for seeing the grandfather in the single girl’s dream holding her hand and smiling. Good news. For her wonderful diet and blessings in her life. It may indicate marriage in the near future. See also: Ibn Sirin’s detailed interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream for a married woman. When a married woman dreams of a dead man in a dream while she is talking to her. A sign of the beginning of a new life in her life, which is full With joy and prosperity, and God knows best. It may indicate satisfying desires and receiving ample support from the husband, and God knows best. As for seeing a dead person in a dream talking to a married woman and kissing her hand. Good signs of pregnancy and abundant nutrition for the newborn, God willing. The appearance of a dead mother sad in a dream. For a married woman. An unpleasant vision because it indicates the dreamer’s defect in her life with her husband and children. But when a pregnant woman sees her father accusing her in a dream, it is a strong sign that the dreamer has sinned against her husband and he has a duty to apologize, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream about a man and its meaning when he sees A dead man laughing in a dream. A praiseworthy vision intended to convey happiness to him in the afterlife. Read also: Interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Meaning of seeing dead people in a pregnant woman’s dream and their interpretation. Seeing dead people in a dream for a pregnant woman has many different meanings. When a pregnant woman dreams of seeing her dead mother In a dream. It is an indication that the time of birth is approaching and that she will give birth to good children, and God knows best. Perhaps the vision indicates the pregnant woman’s need for her mother’s presence at this time in her life. It also suggests that we make things easier for the dreamer and get rid of pain and fatigue after giving birth, and God knows best. And in If a pregnant woman sees her father dead in a dream, the dream indicates that the dreamer will receive invitations and support

title: Interpretation of a dream about dough in the hand

preview.html: As you read the following lines from our website gptafser.com/ the general meaning of seeing dough and an explanation of rolling the dough, cutting it, and baking it in a dream, stay with us. Interpretation of seeing dough by hand in a dream for a single girl. Seeing dough in a virgin girl’s dream indicates that she is being prepared and preparing for an important event in her life. Or attending a happy occasion, and God knows best. If a girl dreams that she is kneading dough with her hand. Soon her far-fetched dreams will come true, whether in work, study, or love. When she sees a girl kneading dough with her friends in a dream. This means a lot of gossip in her speech and telling people things that are not It can be seen. Opening dough in a dream is a blessing from God in what the dreamer is looking for. Opening dough discs in a dream is said to be a sign of an imminent marriage. If a girl eats raw dough in a dream, then she is always in a hurry in her life, which will cost her a lot of losses And regret. Soft fermented dough in a dream indicates a new beginning and ease in life. While dry and dry dough indicates disappointment and frustration. Seeing bread dough in a dream for a single woman means that you will gain benefits, increase blessings, and obtain what you seek, God willing. Interpretation of seeing dough by hand in a dream for a married woman: Dreaming of dough in a married woman’s dream indicates a happy occasion in her home or happy news that will reach her soon, and God knows best. The vision of kneading dough by hand in a married woman’s dream expresses the return of the absent person, and she may receive those she loves and have not seen for a while. Long. Kneading dough also indicates weddings and family occasions. Cutting dough in a dream indicates saving expenses and saving money. Seeing dividing dough in a dream for a married woman represents equality between children in treatment, money, and upbringing, and God knows best. Rolling dough in a dream means discipline. Children and correcting them. And kneading dough with the husband and his earnings and the ability to live and feed, God willing. He kneads dough to make sweets in a dream. There are positive changes that will occur in her life in the near future. See also: The symbol of dough in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of seeing dough in the hand in a dream for a man and its meaning. Dough in A man’s dream symbolizes the journey or return of an absent person from prison or travel, according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation. If you see yourself kneading dough in a dream, this indicates the struggle to earn a living. It was also said that dough is a rest after fatigue, and God knows best. Soft, soft dough in a man’s dream. It symbolizes the ease of work. Unleavened dough indicates the approach of relief and liberation from adversity. Wheat flour dough in a dream indicates money from trade. As for barley dough, it expresses difficulty and lack of livelihood. While bran paste in a dream indicates payment of debts. Oatmeal dough is good news of victory and victory. Against enemies, and God knows best. The meaning of seeing dough in the hand in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Soft white dough in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates ease of pregnancy and childbirth. Dark and dry dough symbolizes problems with pregnancy and difficulty in childbirth. Seeing

title: Interpretation of a dream about black pants for single women

preview.html: But the meaning of the dream depends on knowing the condition, color and type of pants, in addition to knowing the psychological and social status of the pioneer or fortune teller, so in today’s article we will show you the interpretation of the vision by the interpreter. Com, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing black pants in a dream for a single girl. Seeing pants in a dream for an unmarried girl is a sign of goodness that will come to her in the next period of her life. An unmarried girl who dreams of seeing black pants in a dream is a metaphor for a good marriage for her in the future. Seeing pants in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates the girl’s honor and good reputation among the people. As for the girl who dreams of buying black pants in the dream, this dream indicates her marriage to a man who has a high status in society, and God knows best. As for the girl who saw herself buying black pants. And they were wide in a dream. This means that she will marry a religious person or a scholar, and God knows best. If you see white pants in an unmarried girl’s dream, this means marriage. As for an unmarried girl who sees herself wearing new pants and is happy with them in a dream, it is a sign that she will get married. Close to the man her heart desires, and God knows best. Seeing long pants in a dream for an unmarried girl symbolizes the great goodness that prevails in the dreamer, and it may be an inheritance, and God knows best. And when a single girl dreams that she is wearing black pants, and they were too tight for her in the dream The vision is an indication of the obstacles he is going through and the feeling of distress and sadness, and God knows best. Seeing himself wearing torn or dirty pants in the dream of an unmarried girl. It is a sign of fatigue and psychological suffering that she is experiencing and her feeling of despair, and God knows best. Seeing washing black pants in the dream of an unmarried girl. It is a sign that she is entering a new phase of her life, full of happiness and joy. It also indicates achieving success and excellence in study or work. The only girl who sees herself sewing pants in a dream is a metaphor for trying to fix something, and God knows best. Seeing yourself wearing black jeans is a sign of the days. Difficult, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing pants in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing black pants in a dream for a married woman. Seeing pants in a dream for a married woman symbolizes goodness and livelihood. When a married woman sees herself in a clothing store, she is looking for pants and does not find them in the dream. It is a sign that she feels lost and confused in her life, and God knows best. But if the dreamer finds what she is looking for, then there is good news for food and abundant luck in the dreamer’s life. When a married woman sees in a dream that she is buying pants and wearing them, and it was beautiful for her. A metaphor for many Of sustenance for her and her entire family. Seeing her wearing red pants in a married woman’s dream is a good sign of pregnancy. As for wearing black pants in a married woman’s dream, it is evidence of the stability of the woman’s marital life. But when a married woman sees

title: Interpretation of dreams of a man I know having sex with me during my marriage

preview.html: Since the dream indicates wealth and abundant money that you will have now, and this will be clarified in the following article presented by our website gptafser.com/, stay with us.Interpretation of seeing a man I know having sex with me in a dream for a single girl: An unmarried girl seeing that a man she knows had sex with her In a strong dream, and strongly denies that dream. It indicates that she will live in great benefit that will come to her from someone close to her. And he will achieve many ambitions that he dreamed of in the past. The dream also indicates that she has survived hardships and that she will get close to someone who will protect her with his life. It indicates The dream indicates that she will marry a good and good man in the next period of her life. The dream shows that she has ended all the difficult and annoying things that she was going through in her life. It also explains the happy life that she will enter in this period with a good person for her. The dream is interpreted as going through a period Full of passion for someone she knows in life and who is close to her. As for a single woman who asks a man she knows to tie her up, this indicates her request for help from him in life. An unmarried woman who had intercourse with her fiancé in a dream shows her great love for him in this period of her life. See also : Interpretation of dreams that my husband has sex with me and kisses me. Interpretation of seeing a man that I know is having sex with me in a dream for a married woman. Seeing that a married woman sees in a dream a person she knows in life who is related to her other than her husband. An indication of the benefit that she will see in her life, and that she will experience this period of time. It is Its interpretation is that he will get rid of many of the problems that he was going through at the present time. The dream also shows the goodness that she will receive from her husband and the great closeness to him at this time. And if her husband witnesses her having intercourse with a man he knows except in the dream, and he is happy with it. This means that her husband will reach A high position in his professional life during this period. And that he will get rid of the problems and financial crises that he was going through, God willing, and live happily. A married woman asks a man I know in a dream to have intercourse with her in the dream and he accepts. A sign that she will ask this man for help in life, he will accept. Help her. A married woman who had intercourse with her husband in a dream shows her great devotion and love for him. Interpretation of seeing a man I know having sex with me in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman sees that a man she knows well in a dream had sex with her and she refuses. It indicates that she will reject many people who propose marriage. To her. It also shows that she will lose something important, and something big in her life at this time for her. Either the divorced woman who looks in a dream at a man she knows from intercourse with her in the dream and she is happy. She declares her great desire to marry a good and righteous man in her life. And she is still... She deals with this issue in her life, and wants to try it and achieve it again. It indicates a vision of a divorced woman asking one of her acquaintances to have sex with her in a dream. Here it indicates her desire to return to her husband even if the husband is someone else in the dream. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees a man who is mixing with her It indicates the interest

Here it indicates her desire to return to her husband even if the husband is someone else in the dream. Likewise, if a divorced woman sees a man who is mixing with her It indicates the interest

title: Ibn Sirin's interpretations of seeing blood on the ground in a dream

preview.html: Which - seeing blood on the ground in a dream indicates anxiety. There is no doubt that blood is a sign of pain and wounds, so we find that seeing it in a dream makes the dreamer afraid of any upcoming event, but there are many signs that express the meaning of the dream, such as positives, such as marriage. Single people, and among them is the warning of the appearance of distress and fatigue, and from here our honorable scholars explained all these meanings throughout the article.Seeing blood on the ground in a dream by Ibn SirinSeeing blood on the ground in a dreamInterpretation of seeing blood on the ground in a dream leads to exposure to health exhaustion and being affected by some emotions Negativity that makes the dreamer feel upset for a while, but it does not remain in place but rather returns to normal after a while. The vision insinuates that the dreamer’s family is going through some evil and he must stand by them and share their sadness in order to obtain satisfaction from the Lord of the Worlds. The vision is a warning of It is necessary to take care of money and not waste it on trivial matters, so the dreamer and his family must save so that they are not affected by a financial crisis. If blood is found on the road, this indicates a lot of corruption and the dreamer’s dissatisfaction with this corruption, which makes his life vulnerable to harm, and here he must try to remove it no matter what happens so that it is able to do so. Living in safety. Seeing blood on the ground in a dream by Ibn Sirini. The respected scholar tells us that the presence of blood on the ground leads to the inability to make an important decision in the dreamer’s life and his inability to take positive steps in life, so he must get rid of his negativity to be better and better. Seeing this dream confirms the necessity of paying attention to prayer and remembrance of God Almighty, so that the dreamer gets rid of any fatigue that befalls him, no matter what happens. If blood comes out of the head, this indicates the presence of many wrong thoughts in the dreamer’s head, and here he needs to get rid of them immediately. But if blood comes out of the leg This indicates the inability to achieve all the goals that the dreamer desires, and this will only end with optimism and the pursuit of dreams to achieve self-fulfillment. The vision indicates the arrival of bad and annoying tidings to the dreamer, which puts him in harm that he cannot get rid of except with patience and contentment with all the judgment of his Lord. It includes Unit Interpretation of dreams on the Egyptian website From Google, you can find many interpretations and questions from the following. Seeing blood on the ground in a single woman’s dream. The sight of blood coming out of an unmarried woman is considered auspicious for her, as it does not explain evil, but rather is evidence of her soon marriage and happiness. If it comes down Blood from the mouth, then she must take shelter in God, take care of her religion, and pray to God to save her from the evils that she has been exposed to in her life. The vision means that the dreamer will suffer a financial loss, especially if there is a lot of blood, and here she must understand the reason for this loss in order to find The appropriate solution immediately. The vision indicates fatigue and confusion that can be eliminated by reading the Qur’an, practicing medicine, and following a good doctor until you get rid of all this fatigue. Seeing blood on the ground in a dream for a married woman. A married woman goes through many events in his life.

title: Interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website Vision roy2a.com, as seeing a cake in a dream and buying it. A sign of family stability and a happy life for the owner of the vision, so we will talk about the interpretation of this vision through our article about the single girl, the married woman, the pregnant woman, the man, the young man and the divorced woman. What is the interpretation of a divorced woman seeing a cake in a dream? Seeing a divorced woman in a dream and she received a gift from her ex-husband, She was beautiful in appearance, an indication that he had brought her good and abundant sustenance through him. The final vision of getting a large cake from a stranger is a sign of her relationship with a good man who carries high morals and brings her happiness and psychological peace. See also: Interpretation of seeing breastfeeding in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a cake in A dream for a man? A man sees a cake in a dream. His introduction to a beautiful girl and his intense interest in her is a sign of the strength of love and emotional connection between them and the beginning of a happy and peaceful life. Seeing a man receiving a gift of a cake in a dream indicates that the wide doors of livelihood will be opened for him through a job, a wonderful opportunity, or obtaining a promotion. Great at work. See also: Interpretation of seeing a burial in a dream. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees a cake in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman with a cake in a dream and preparing it for her children is evidence of the ease of her birth, the ease of her birth, and her being blessed with children who will be fair to her while bringing tremendous goodness to her. A pregnant woman’s dream offers progress. A large, beautiful cake for her husband indicates the enjoyment of great family stability and the presence of happiness and great love between them. What is the interpretation of a single young man who sees a cake in a dream? Seeing an unmarried young man talking about cake in a dream, and her big birthdays and her feeling happy with them is evidence of the abundance of sustenance that he will convey to them. Seeing a young man He makes a large, beautiful cake in a dream after many failed attempts. This indicates that he is striving for many things that will not benefit him, and that God will grant him success in the end. See also: Interpretation of seeing a monastery in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a single girl eating a cake in a dream? Seeing a single girl eating a cake in a dream Good conditions and enjoyment of health, well-being and psychological peace. A single woman seeing a colorful cake in a dream is a sign of hearing happy and joyful news soon. Seeing a yellow cake in a dream is a sign of ill health and serious illness. What is the interpretation of a married woman who sees a cake in a dream? Seeing a married woman eating a cake in a dream and it was large in size. And beautiful in appearance, which indicates the presence of stability and reassurance between her and her husband. Seeing a married woman giving her husband a large cake is a sign of the strength of love, affection and kindness between them. Seeing buying a large cake in a married woman’s dream is an indication of overcoming difficulties and problems and the ability to solve marital problems. See also: Interpretation of the vision of the orchard. Green in a dream: What is the interpretation of seeing a cake in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing a cake in a dream according to Ibn Sirin indicates his great pressures, responsibilities, and great patience.

title: Interpretation of going for Umrah in a dream for a single, pregnant or married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the following article, we explain to you what is the interpretation of going for Umrah in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, in addition to clarifying the interpretation of this vision according to Al-Nabulsi. When he wakes up from his sleep, he feels confused about the interpretation of his dream. Through this article from the encyclopedia, you can see the interpretation of going for Umrah in a dream for single people, pregnant women, married people, and men. Religious symbols in a dream are considered among the most important symbols that promise goodness to dreamers and that they are happy to see, such as traveling to Umrah and performing its rituals, and the most important means of bringing the servant closer to God and atonement for sins, as the Messenger said about it, may God bless him and grant him peace: continuity between Hajj and Umrah, for they remove poverty. And sins, just as the blower removes impurities of iron, gold, and silver. So what are the hidden messages behind this dream for one girl, and this is what we will show you in the following lines. Interpretation of going for Umrah in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says: If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is performing Umrah rituals This is a vision that warns him of long hours of work. The vision of going to Umrah in a dream indicates that the dreamer is on the path to guidance, and this vision also indicates a change in circumstances for the better. The vision of going to Umrah in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that indicates great sustenance. Which the dreamer will receive in his life. If the dreamer is sick and sees in a dream that he is about to perform Umrah rituals, this is good news that he will recover from the illness and enjoy good health. If the dreamer is suffering from problems and fears in his life, then seeing a dream about going to Umrah indicates The end of those worries, the alleviation of anxiety and the solution of problems. Interpretation of Umrah in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dream interpreter Ibn Sirin mentioned that seeing Umrah in a dream is one of the visions that express the dreamer’s desire to repent to God and abandon forbidden things. This vision shows the abundance of goodness for the dreamer, the abundance of sustenance with money, and his long life. Long, and enjoying good health in reality. As for the meaning of seeing a bachelor in a dream, it indicates marriage to a girl of good character. Ibn Sirin indicated that this vision may symbolize the dreamer performing the Umrah rituals in reality, and God knows best. This dream is good news for the dreamer that anxiety It will pass and sadness will leave him and the situation will change from difficulty to ease. If the dreamer is already suffering from a financial crisis, then seeing him performing Umrah in a dream is good news for the end of this crisis. If the dreamer sees himself returning from Umrah in a dream, this means that he will obtain what he aspires for. To him in reality. The vision of going to Umrah in a dream indicates the dreamer’s integrity, the integrity of his heart, and his diligence in obeying God. This vision indicates the beginning of a new phase in the dreamer’s life, which may be a new job opportunity or travel abroad, and God knows best. The dream of going to Umrah also indicates Imam Nabulsi says that seeing a dream about Umrah is a dream worthy of praise. This vision shows an increase in health

title: Seeing chicks in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Chicks are considered gentle and lovable creatures in the heart, and seeing them also shows kindness, but according to their color and shape, and the vision differs from one person to another, so we will display this vision clearly through mofser.com, so follow along. We.Interpretation of seeing chicks in a dream for one girl: Seeing a single girl in her dream with many colorful and beautiful chickens emerging from their eggs, healthy and not dead. This vision is considered good news for whoever proposes to marry her and move her from her family home to the marital home as soon as possible. If she sees An unmarried or engaged girl has beautiful yellow and cheerful chicks in her dream, this indicates more than one meaning. It may indicate her marriage to a person of good character or indicates her success if she is a seeker of knowledge or her promotion at work. Seeing a small yellow chick could be in A dream about one girl is unfavorable and praiseworthy. This may indicate some difficulties or problems that she is facing in her life, but she will get rid of them soon. Seeing chicks in one girl’s dream means more than one good interpretation, both on the emotional and professional levels. The dream is interpreted Through the girl entering into a romantic relationship that ends in marriage and indicates that she will obtain a prominent position in her work. But if an unmarried girl sees that she is providing food and water for small chickens, then she raises them and takes care of them. The vision is an indication that he always accepts charitable works, loves others and provides material assistance. And moral. See also: Interpretation of dreams about chicks emerging from eggs. Interpretation of seeing chicks in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees eggs hatching in her dream and she has not yet given birth or her birth is delayed. This vision indicates that God will bless her with good offspring immediately after her longing and supplications to God. As for seeing chicks Many and colorful dreams in a married woman’s dream are among the desirable and beloved visions. They indicate marital happiness and the husband’s satisfaction with her, and his sacrifice for her happiness, and she enjoys a peaceful married life. What if a married woman sees chicks or plays with colorful and happy chicks and she is happy with that and has children. And this An indication of her children, whose presence she is happy with and who fill her life with them, and perhaps an indication that she will soon have brothers. A married woman watching the chicks, feeding them, and drinking them is a good sign for the dreamer. It indicates some qualities that she likes, such as purity of heart, generosity, and willingness to provide assistance to everyone. But if a married woman sees Dead chicks, or their young ones slaughtered in their sleep, then she must seek refuge in God. The vision indicates a loss of religion or the world, or the presence of obstacles that prevent a person from achieving what he desires. Interpretation of seeing chicks in a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing many chickens in a man’s dream has more than one explanation and explanation. But in general, it is good news for him. It indicates a new life, a new baby, a new home, a promotion at work, or a prestigious job. If a man sees yellow chicks in his dream and he is a merchant or has his own project or a partner in a business. The dream indicates profit Puzzle

title: Interpretation of seeing marriage in a dream for a woman and a man

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about marriage in a dream for a woman and a man. Marriage is a stage of life that both sexes go through in search of stability and family. Although it is a beautiful stage of life, it is full of responsibilities and returns. The duties that both parties must know. Seeing a marriage event in a dream is one of the most complex dreams, because the idea of ​​marriage varies from one person to another and cannot be precisely defined. In this article, we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing marriage in a dream for women and men. Interpretation of the dream of seeing marriage and divorce in a dream If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is about to get married, this indicates that the dreamer will obtain goodness and blessings in his affairs. If a man sees divorce in a dream This may indicate that the dreamer will leave the one he loves if he is single. Seeing divorce in a man’s dream may indicate the death of the dreamer if he is sick. As for the interpretation of a man who sees himself divorcing his wife in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will die from his wife. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a wedding in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is about to get married, this may indicate that the dreamer will have a strong desire to get married. Seeing a wedding in an unmarried girl’s dream may indicate that the dreamer will change her life. From one situation to another.• Regarding the interpretation of seeing a man outside the husband’s marriage in a married woman’s dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will receive many good things from her family.• Seeing marriage to a man other than the husband in a married woman’s dream may mean that the dreamer He will benefit from her husband.• If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she will get married and have a wedding, this indicates that the dreamer will have a son from her.• If a pregnant woman dreams that she will get married, but without a wedding, this may indicate that the dreamer will have a child of Feminine.• If one sees marrying an old man in a married woman’s dream, this may mean that the dreamer will obtain her husband’s money and a large profit.• As for the interpretation of a married woman who sees that she is getting married in her dream and giving birth to a son, this may indicate that the dreamer will marry her son. • With regard to the interpretation of a dream about a dead person marrying in a married woman’s dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will lose her money. • As for the interpretation of a married woman who sees that she is marrying a dead person in her dream and he is marrying her, this may indicate the death of the dreamer. • As for the interpretation of a dream about marriage From an unknown person in a dream of a sick married woman, this may indicate the death of the dreamer.• As for the interpretation of a married woman’s dream that her dead husband marries her in her dream, this may indicate the death of the dreamer or the death of a sick person she knows.• As for the interpretation of a married woman’s dream that he gets married If her husband is married to another woman in her dream and marries her, this may indicate that the dreamer will gain her husband’s approval with a new art. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a wedding in a dream for a man• If the dreamer sees his wife marrying another man in his dream, this may mean that the dreamer will flourish in his work.• If a man sees in his dream that he is marrying his wife to another man, this may indicate that the dreamer
